load

public static void load(java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                        java.io.IOException
Load field average length from a file and set idfField value, the file must have the next format:
FIELD_NAME
FLOAT_VALUE
ANOTHER_FIELD_NAME
ANOTHER_FIELD_VALUE
for example:
CONTENT
459.2903f
ANCHOR
84.55523f

Parameters:
path - absolute path of the file
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException
java.io.IOException
